title.value: The efficiency of new forms of micro fertilizers application and growth regulators application in a crop rotation link
Эффективность применения новых форм микроудобрений и регуляторов роста в звене севооборота

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Glatankova, I.V., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented the results of studies of the following crop rotation link: maize (Zea mays) - spring wheat (Triticum aestivum) - pea (Pisum). The effect of different levels of fertilizer application, the combination of fertilizer with different kinds of organic fertilizer (manure and straw), plant growth regulators, foliar feedings with new forms of single-component and multi-micronutrients in chelated form on yield and quality of crops, the productivity level of crop rotation. The maximum yield of spring wheat (48,0-48,3 t / ha of grain) was achieved in the variants with application Ecosil on the background of N70R60K90 and Vitamar on backgrounds N70R60K90 + N30 CAS and N80P80K130 + N45 +25 and when combined with manure and straw N70R60K90 + N30. Plant growth regulator fitovital on average in 2009 and 2010 on background N30P60K90 raised pea seed yield by 5.0 kg / ha, and growth regulator Appin - on the 2, 1 kg / ha, with a new boron microfertilizer growth regulator Elegum V - 4.7, Vitamar - 4.8 centner / ha, Basfoliar 36 Extra - 4.7 and Ekolist - 5.3 centner / ha.
